Specialised in Human-Computer-Interactions and Web Applications. My thesis was focused on designing and developing a wordless picture book application for young children. The course provided the fundamentals of software and hardware computing solutions for real-world problems. This includes understanding operating systems and database systems (SQL, NoSQL) creating programs using C#, C++, and Java. As well as creating mobile and web applications by using programming languages such as HTML, XML, CSS and JavaScript. Apart from this also studying artificial intelligence (Lisp, Prolog) and human-computer interactions. Therefore, developing mathematical, analytical and problem-solving skills for the computing industry.

A UX designer, developer, and digital strategist based in London with expertise in web development and product management. Passionate about creating user-friendly experiences and optimising customer journeys, specialising in strategies that drive results and bring ideas to life.

I’m Ling Kan, a London-based digital leader with a unique blend of technical expertise, creative flair, and a passion for crafting exceptional user experiences. With a background in computer science and a natural knack for design, I bring a distinctive perspective to every project—seamlessly merging technical precision with artistic vision to deliver impactful, user-centric solutions.

Over the years, I’ve built a diverse career spanning UX design, product management, web development, and marketing. I’ve led website redesigns, launched innovative products, and driven strategic initiatives that enhance SEO, boost user engagement, and improve conversion rates (CRO). My hands-on experience with tools like Google Analytics, Glassbox, and AI heat maps enables me to uncover valuable insights and optimise customer journeys with data-driven precision.

What sets me apart is my ability to connect the dots between strategy, creativity, and technology. From managing cross-functional teams to delivering end-to-end solutions, I thrive on turning complex challenges into opportunities for growth. My marketing experience has sharpened my storytelling skills, while my technical background ensures every solution is scalable, efficient, and future-proof.

I take a lean, collaborative approach to problem-solving, fostering high-performing teams and delivering value efficiently. Whether designing a user interface, analysing website performance, or leading a product launch, I’m dedicated to creating digital experiences that inspire and drive results.
